## Source: khulnasoft-package-analysis (439cc07d596a21554c885d3eef5e28a7ae905f1ca89ed66776681f91b6c9c6eb)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'simulation_service' @ 1.0.2 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
